p1desc: Worked in a group of 4 to develop a system that could recognize and translate gestures to a UR5e robotic arm using computer vision and machine learning, a depth camera and skeleton tracking software, and ROS2 and the Gazebo simulator.
Conceptualization lasted throughout the final school year alongside consistent meetings with professors meant to guide and manage the team.
p2desc: Worked in a group of 7 to develop a C++ based calculator + GUI to perform linear algebra operations
Simulated an agile development process, gaining experience with Jira and Confluence.
p3desc: Worked in a group of 4 to implemenet a compiler for a new programming language by modifying the existing PT Pascal compiler.
